latex: The Trick'cord Treat Bot, made by Discord Developers, drops an item into the chat every $3.5$ minutes. Every message reduces the time left by 2 times the number of letters in the word. If Blob spams a message once every second and his average typing speed is 3 letters per second, how many seconds will he take the Trick'cord Treat Bot to drop an item? Note that the Bot dropped an item and as soon as it was over, Blob started spamming.
